participants.name: Tim Bangert
participants.description: IS Business Relationship Manager at OhioHealth

messages.message:
Hey Brian, give me two kinds of beer you like. Maybe I'll pick some up for this evening at Megan's.
Tim

Brian
I like any kind of beer. Blue moon is always good, but I'll drink whatever.
So I went to get it earlier and knew you liked more flavorful and fuller beers. How about Guinness?

Brian
Thank you for the Christmas card!
You're welcome! Hope you and Iga have a merry Christmas!
